Articles.Content: found a munolith near ksc yes it is the easiest to find but it is cool
There are no munoliths on Kerbin. Kerboliths, yes.

> 
> There are no munoliths on Kerbin. Kerboliths, yes.

Lies. This guy is so epic that he flew to the mun, picked up a munolith, flew back to kerbin, and deposited it near the KSC.

> 
> That plane looks rediculous

Of course it does. This is KSP you\'re talking about.

> 
> Put a spaceplane on the runway... don\'t take off. Zoom out. Should be a black pixel or two a few klicks north of the KSC.
I just found it by accident,I was riding some rocket car thing I made, and crashed directly into it O.o
